sentences.sContent: His moralism is all-encompassing and as passionate as can be. He plans to replace state welfare provision with faith-based charitable organisations that would impose Christian family values.
sentences.sContent_eng: His moralism is all-encompassing and as passionate as can be. He plans to replace state welfare provision with faith-based charitable organisations that would impose Christian family values.
sentences.sCn: 他的道德说教可谓包罗万象,激情澎湃.他计划创建以信仰为基础的慈善机构来代替国家福利事业,以滋养基督家庭的社会价值观.
